node.title: Philippines President Duterte will not run against daughter, opting instead for Senate
node.alt: A man with short hair gestures with his closed right hand as he speaks into a microphone.
node.description: Mr Duterte previously said he would run for the vice-presidency, until his daughter announced her intentions to do the same.Â
node.content:
["Philippines President Rodrigo Duterte will compete for a seat in the country's Senate in elections next year,\u00a0ending speculation that he would run for vice-president against his own daughter.\u00a0", "A lawyer for Mr Duterte, 76, filed his senatorial candidacy at the Commission on Elections before the Monday deadline for last-minute contenders in May's nationwide elections.", "Over the weekend, Mr Duterte said that he planned to register his candidacy for the vice-presidency.", "However, legal experts say that could have contravened Philippine law which limits presidents to a single six-year term, as the vice-president replaces the elected president if the latter dies or gets incapacitated for any reason, according to the country's constitution.", "The president backed out again from his latest plan to pursue the vice-presidency after learning that his daughter, Sara\u00a0Duterte-Carpio, had\u00a0filed her vice-presidential candidacy\u00a0on Saturday.", "Mr Duterte announced early last month that he was retiring from politics after dropping plans to run for vice-president due to what he said was widespread public sentiment against the move.", "
Father and daughter 'love each other'
", "Presidential spokesperson\u00a0Harry Roque\u00a0ruled out the possibility of father and daughter running against each other earlier on Monday.", "\"What I can say is \u2013 the father and daughter, President Rodrigo Roa Duterte and Mayor Inday Sara, love each other,\" Mr Roque said, referring to Ms Duterte-Carpio by her nickname.", "Mr Duterte's 43-year-old daughter, the current mayor of Davao,\u00a0had previously been expected to run to succeed him as president due to her popularity and clear lead in all opinion polls this year on preferred candidates.", "Ms Duterte will be the running mate of presidential candidate Ferdinand Marcos Jr, the son and namesake of the late Philippine dictator.", "", "
Sara Duterte-Carpio is running for the vice-presidency\u00a0of the Philippines.(Reuters: Lean Daval Jr/File photo)
", "
Activists outraged by decision
", "Cristina Palabay of Karapatan, a left-wing alliance of human rights groups, was outraged by Mr Duterte's plan\u00a0to run for political office.\u00a0", "\"Duterte's run for the Senate is yet another attempt of the tyrant to evade accountability from the International Criminal Court and other accountability mechanisms,\" she said.", "\"It is as sinister, opportunist and underhanded as the attempts of his daughter and allies to run in the 2022 elections.\"", "Mr Duterte, a longtime city mayor known for his extra-tough approach to criminality and illegal drugs, launched an anti-drugs crackdown after winning the presidency in 2016 that has left more than 6,000 mostly petty suspects dead and alarmed Western governments and human rights groups.", "The International Criminal Court has begun an investigation of the killings, but Duterte has vowed never to cooperate with the inquiry or allow ICC investigators into the country.", "ABC/wires"]
